entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
